fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: -Kill people who mention Christmas before December

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
-If the month is November, anyone who mentions Christmas (determined by host as what counts as “mentioning”) is instantly killed with an unstoppable attack
-Anyone who mentions Thanksgiving will be given invincible defense for the night

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Convince at least 2 players into mentioning Christmas before the end of the game
